Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2009 07:51PM Jenny4210 wrote: Hi notinvincible, I guess we are kind the same.  I also have IDC and ILC.  I just turned 42 and was diagnosed on Nov. 18th.  I too wonder how I got here.  Have you had surgery?  I had a mastectomy on Monday.  They originally thought I wouldn't have to have chemo, said they were surprised by the lymph nodes, but oh well.  All I really want is to be ok, boob or no boob.  I have 3 kids, 15, 12, and 4.  I told the 2 older kids and they are being great.  I am just really having a tough time acting like all is going to be ok.  Does anyone know how to do that?  Good luck with everything and if you ever want to talk, please write me.
Posts.Title: Just diadnosed and petrified SPoole Frankie_
